Timer.name: Status bar tic display
Timer.script: if tic_timer and tic_timer.temp_timers.aggro_pulse then --determine current time left on the timer local ctime = tic_timer.configs.tic_length * (5 - tic_timer.configs.aggro_pulse)/6 + remainingTime(tic_timer.temp_timers.aggro_pulse) status_bar.tic_timer:echo(string.format("TNT: %0.1f", ctime), "white", "c") end
